definition: lane (usually as part of a street name)/memorial archway

sentences.english: If you turn the stereo up to maximum volume, the neighbours will complain.
sentences.chinese: 如果你将音量调到最大，街坊邻居就会表示不满。
全新的邻里街坊涌现出来。

sentences.english: Joe gathered the boys and girls of the neighbourhood for a picnic.
sentences.chinese: 乔把街坊四邻的男孩和女孩们集合起来去野餐。

sentences.english: The children in the neighborhood disturbed my life.
sentences.chinese: 街坊邻居的孩子们把握的生活搅得不得安宁。

sentences.english: He went to his neighbour to beg for some milk to feed the motherless baby.
sentences.chinese: 他找街坊邻居讨了一些牛奶来喂养那个没娘的孩子。

sentences.english: By the time the snowman's nose was in place, the neighborhood was fully awake.
sentences.chinese: 等到雪人堆好，鼻子也装好，街坊邻居都已起来了。

sentences.english: It asks us the teahouse as the centre of the neighbourhood.
sentences.chinese: 它叫我们茶馆作为街坊四邻的活动中心。

sentences.english: The whole neighbourhood talked about it.
sentences.chinese: 火灾使整个街坊邻里都惊恐起来。

sentences.english: I know that the neighborhood has been getting rough. The crime has been increasing.
sentences.chinese: 我知道街坊们越来越难打交道了，犯罪率也在上升。

sentences.english: That's one thing that Union Square has always been as an artist's neighborhood.
sentences.chinese: 那也是联合广场被称作艺术家街坊的原因。

sentences.english: Burnt to cinders, we were told by the neighbourhood gossips.
sentences.chinese: 我们从街坊四邻的闲言碎语中得知他被烧成了灰。

sentences.english: Children in neighbourhood disturbed my life.
sentences.chinese: 街坊邻居的孩子们把握的生活搅得不得安宁。

sentences.english: Their neighbours all crowded in to wish them well.
sentences.chinese: 街坊们都拥进来为他们祝福。

sentences.english: The neighbor’s kids are the bane of my life.
sentences.chinese: 街坊邻居的孩子们把握的生活搅得不得安宁。

sentences.english: The next day, I cruised over to my old neighborhood.
sentences.chinese: 第二天我便到处去走访那些老街坊。

sentences.english: The fire alarmed the whole neighbourhood.
sentences.chinese: 火灾使整个街坊邻里都惊恐起来。

definition: neighbors/next-door neighbors/related work units/colleagues doing related work
see 左鄰右舍|左邻右舍[zuo3 lin2 you4 she4]
Liwan district of Guangzhou city 廣州市|广州市[Guang3 zhou1 shi4], Guangdong
side street/road branching from the main street
Haizhu district of Guangzhou city 廣州市|广州市[Guang3 zhou1 shi4], Guangdong
fellow countryman (from the same village)/local people/villager/the folks back home
Doumen district of Zhuhai city 珠海市[Zhu1 hai3 shi4], Guangdong
uncle (polite form of address for older male)
